body_html:
@martinwicke , it is confusing the doc generator gives all the possible types of tensors all the time, even when we don't have kernels registered.

@weiliu620 , thanks for reporting this. We should definitely at least update the documentation. If you would like to provide float16 functionality for maxpool3d that would be great. But we are likely not to get to it anytime soon. Thanks!

body:
@martinwicke , it is confusing the doc generator gives all the possible types of tensors all the time, even when we don't have kernels registered.

@weiliu620 , thanks for reporting this. We should definitely at least update the documentation. If you would like to provide float16 functionality for maxpool3d that would be great. But we are likely not to get to it anytime soon. Thanks!
